pages.text: I’m so grateful for my server members because they find new features all the time that I never knew were a thing, much like custom images! $(strike)They wouldn’t tell me how they did it for the longest time lol$()$(br2)All you need is a camera, a spare piece of paper and an image frame to display it. While holding the camera in your hand, press shift and then right click. All you need
to do is click the ‘upload’ option, find the picture you want and boom! The image will be placed in your inventory.$(br2)You can also resize the image frame by holding shift and right clicking it.
